title: A Chance for children
creator_credit: Michael Craven, Thomas Craven Film Corporation and UNICEF
brief_description: Shows how breast feeding, growth charts, oral rehydration therapy and immunization are successful in lowering child mortality and provide millions of children with an improved quality of life.
